pages.text: $(li)Creepers are common hostile creatures that can be found over the Overworld when the night arrives or in places with low lighting.$(br)$(li)They silently approaches you and finally, explotes, damaging you and near blocks.$(br)$(li)They may drop Gunpowder and Creeper Spores on death.
Creepiers eventually will be turn into Creepers.
$(li)If a Creeper is strucked by a lightning, it will turns into Charged Creeper.$(br)$(li)This creature inflicts more damage when explotes.
pages.title: Charged Creeper
